thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au | 2 of 248
thread.title: Samuel
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Samuel

author: Samuel
title: Samuel
text: Prices were so good that I was skeptical at first. Did the usual search to see if there were any "beware" or "scam alert" .... BUT NO, this site is geniuine! I took the plunge and placed an order. On top of great prices, the commiunicatuon was proactive and friendly. And then I also happen to choose a product with "fast delivery" and it was quick, and I had ordered prescription and not just off the shelf product. Overall, highly recommended and I will buy from them again for sure.
